excerpt: Indulge in this rich and creamy vegan chocolate dessert that is easy to make!

instructions.name: Chocolate Mousse Base
instructions: In a blender or food processor, blend the avocado, maple syrup, cocoa powder, almond milk, and vanilla extract until completely smooth and creamy.
Spoon the mixture into two small bowls or cups.

instructions.name: Toppings
instructions: Top each chocolate mousse with whipped coconut cream, sliced strawberries, and chocolate chips.
